thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Indian Bank Dec Qtr Profit Down 18 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Indian Bank Dec Qtr Profit Down 18 Pct
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Indian Bank:
* DEC QUARTER NET PROFIT 3.03 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 3.73 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 43.54 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 39.58 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS 9.18 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 5.40 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS FOR NON-PERFORMING ASSETS 3.85 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 5.47 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
* DEC QUARTER GROSS NPA 6.27 PERCENT VERSUS 6.67 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC QUARTER NET NPA 3.30 PERCENT VERSUS 3.41 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER Source text - bit.ly/2G3IHaA Further company coverage:
